title: Senior Campus
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: In panel interviews, staff, students and parents of two schools, Bendigo Senior High and Kurani College, Morwell, discuss issues related to planning, developing and running of a senior campus and a school complex with a senior campus.
